summary: The caching layer was deployed to production, showing a 40% improvement in response times. The metrics dashboard is available for monitoring.
questions: What is the status of the caching layer deployment?
Where can I see the caching performance metrics?
Who should I contact if I have issues with the new caching layer?
What are the initial performance improvements from the caching layer?
What does the metrics dashboard show?
title: Caching Layer Deployment Update
text: Hey @channel! 🎉 Just deployed the new caching layer to production. Initial metrics show 40% improvement in response times! Dashboard: https://metrics.company.com/cache-perf Let me know if you see any issues. I'll be monitoring for the next hour. cc: @ops-team

messages.speaker: @alex_rodriguez
